definitions: The action of throwing a baseball or similar object, especially in a game.
The act of setting up a tent or camp.
The act of promoting or presenting an idea, product, or person to others.
The act of moving with a sudden up-and-down motion, as a ship in rough water.
examples: He is pitching a no-hitter in the game.
They are pitching their tent by the river.
She is pitching her new business idea to investors.
The boat was pitching heavily in the storm.
